Params[3]: Whoa! I know this! This... is a mystery box, isn't it?!
I once had to buy six of them to get the finger puppet I wanted... Sob...
Now, let me give it a good shake... Hmm. Feels like something soft and fluffy.
Pulao opens the box, squinting as she finds a panda plushie dressed as the weaver girl inside. Unlike the perfectly made plushie itself, the dress looks hand-stitched.
Oh my god! That's so cute! Could this be a secret variant?!

Params[2]: I think the maker must have made this by hand.

Params[3]: I hereby declare that this is the Limited Double-Seventh-Exclusive Panda plushie! More importantly, it's a gift from Commandant!

Params[2]: Yeah, this is the only one in the world.

Params[3]: Join our Double Seventh Festival celebration next year, Commandant! I also want to prepare a mystery box that will surprise you!
